characteristic.name: Preferred Units
characteristic.description:
The Preferred Units characteristic is the list of units the user prefers.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

fields.name: Units
fields.description:
This field is an array of 16-bit UUIDs from the available units defined in the Bluetooth SIG Assigned Numbers \RefRef{assigned_numbers}.
If there are multiple entries for the same physical quantity in the array, the order of the units defines the preference (the first unit is the most preferred; the last unit is the least preferred).
